uk.mrs.saralarm.ui.settings.extra_ui.rul.android:summary:
Configure as many rules as you like using a phrase, SMS number or both. If the "Both" option is selected, a received SMS containing the "phrase" would've had to come from the "SMS Number" to trigger the alarm.
Example:
•SMS number: 07........(SARCALL Number or alternative)
•Phrase: LAKESMRT (A phrase common within the callout SMS messages)
